name: Mount Groom
description:
Mount Groom

You're a mountain goatball, help the nice bird to rid the mountain of all trespassers and annoyances.

Playtime: around 5-10 min

A small game created for the Global Game Jam 2020 with a few improvements and changes (you can actually finish the game this time!). The theme this year was "repair" and we chose to represent it by restoring and clearing a mountain, with a little twist.

Sound/Music: Silia Hahne (@bendyloss, soundcloud.com/siliahahne)
